definition: Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
man
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: Liu Xin revised The Classic of Mountains and Rivers, which contributed to the wide spreading in Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 刘歆的校订对于扩大《山海经》在两汉传播亦有贡献。

sentences.english: The second cycle began with criticism and reconsideration of the Confucian Ethics.
sentences.chinese: 第二个周期从批判和反思两汉“名教”开始。

sentences.english: The custom of elaborate funeral was popular during the Han Dynasty due to people's belief in the existence of gods and ghosts and filial piety.
sentences.chinese: 对鬼神的迷信和孝观念的盛行使两汉兴起了厚葬之风。

sentences.english: During the Han Dynasty, the stone tablet sum which was habitually called the sum of seal script was mostly written with the seal script.
sentences.chinese: 两汉时期的碑额多用篆书书写，习惯性的被称为篆额。

sentences.english: Shi, according to records, the Xia and Shang Dynasties period began Wuqiang officially formed in the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 据史志记载，武强始于夏商时期，正式建制于两汉。

sentences.english: Zhou, Qin and Han Dynasties was the important period for the formation and development of the belief.
sentences.chinese: 周秦两汉是神仙信仰形成与发展的重要时期。

sentences.english: For the text of the Han Chenyan, this chapter is divided into four sections.
sentences.chinese: 对于两汉谶言的文本分析，本章分为四个小节。

sentences.english: Rite plays an important role in the literary conception of Pre-Qin period and Han dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 先秦两汉文学观念背后，礼起着支配作用。

sentences.english: Han Dynasty, set up temporary elm County.
This chapter from the literary point of view outside the Han Dynasty Chenyan for multiple interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 本章从文学领域之外的角度对两汉谶言进行多元解读。

sentences.english: Han Dynasty to the Northern and Southern is XiaoRouzhi migration and an important period of national change.
sentences.chinese: 两汉至南北朝是小月氏人迁徙与民族变迁的重要时期。

sentences.english: From Han Dynasty to Sui-Tang and Five Dynasties, the entertainment of Touhu has become prominent gradually.
sentences.chinese: 两汉至隋唐五代时期，此期投壶的娱乐性逐渐凸显。

sentences.english: From the pre-Qin period to the Ming dynasty, the consciousness of the numerical concept experienced great changes.
sentences.chinese: 自先秦经两汉至宋明，数字观念问题意识有较大转变。

sentences.english: Prophetic Theology is a flow of distinctive social trend of thought in the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 谶纬是两汉时期独特的社会思潮。

sentences.english: The Han Dynasty (the Eastern Han Dynasty and the Western Han Dynasty) is the first period filled with disasters in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 两汉时期是中国历史上的第一个灾害多发期。

sentences.english: Bamboo and wood slips and silk are the hook materials in Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 两汉书籍的形态是简牍书和帛书两种。

definition: Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
Eastern or later Han dynasty, 25-220
the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
Wei (220-265) and Jin (265-420) dynasties
Western Han Dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 前漢|前汉[Qian2 Han4], Former Han Dynasty
Northern and Southern dynasties (420-589)
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
Sui (581-617) and Tang dynasties (618-907)
Western Jin dynasty (265-316)
Qin dynasty (221-207 BC), founded by the first emperor Qin Shihuang 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2], the first dynasty to rule the whole of China
the Qin (221-207 BC) and Han (206 BC-220 AD) dynasties
Xia, Shang and Zhou, the earliest named Chinese dynasties
Han Dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
Former Han dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 西漢|西汉[Xi1 Han4], Western Han dynasty
the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
